item.title: GhAOC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAOC1 Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Improvement of copper tolerance of Arabidopsis by transgenic expression of an allene oxide cyclase gene, GhAOC1, in upland cotton.

item.title: GhPIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPIP2|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhPIP2|6|3 interacted with GhPIP2|6|4 and GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6, but GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6 did not interact with GhPIP2|6|4.

item.title: MdAO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000863012 Gene Symbol: MdAO1 Gene Name: Amine Oxidase 1 Genome: Apple Genome Database Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple Fruit Copper Amine Oxidase Isoforms: Peroxisomal MdAO1 Prefers Diamines as Substrates, Whereas Extracellular MdAO2 Exclusively Utilizes Monoamines.

item.title: MdAO2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000197462 Gene Symbol: MdAO2 Gene Name: Amine Oxidase 2 Genome: Apple Genome Database Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple Fruit Copper Amine Oxidase Isoforms: Peroxisomal MdAO1 Prefers Diamines as Substrates, Whereas Extracellular MdAO2 Exclusively Utilizes Monoamines.

item.title: MdHMA5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Md03G1182600 Gene Symbol: MdHMA5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdWRKY11 improves copper tolerance by directly promoting the expression of the copper transporter gene MdHMA5.

item.title: MdWRKY11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Md15G1054000 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY11 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdWRKY11 improves copper tolerance by directly promoting the expression of the copper transporter gene MdHMA5.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: MtCOPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g019870 Gene Symbol: MtCOPT1 Gene Name: COPT transporter 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Medicago truncatula copper transporter 1 (MtCOPT1) delivers copper for symbiotic nitrogen fixation.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCT1-5A Gene Name: copper transporter1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of a novel copper transporter gene family TaCT1 in common wheat.

item.title: TaWRKY74
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5D02G190800 Gene Symbol: TaWRKY74 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 74 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: TaWRKY74 participates copper tolerance through regulation of TaGST1 expression and GSH content in wheat.

item.title: WCBP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: WCBP1 Gene Name: wheat copper-binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat WCBP1 encodes a putative copper-binding protein involved in stripe rust resistance and inhibition of leaf senescence.
